title: Telemetry Event
description: A telemetry event for Enterprise Telemetry Monitor

application.description: The name of the application which send or receives the event

creationTime.description: The creation time of the event

direction.description: The of the event in the context of the application

endpoint.description: The endpoint this event was received/send from

expiryTime.description: The time after which the event is expired

metadata.description: The metadata of the event. Metadata can be used to add custom properties to an event

sourceCorrelationId.description: The id of the related/parent event

transactionName.description: The name of the transaction this event starts
